column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello May - Thank you for your review. I'm sorry your server failed to bring you hot water as you had requested. Since the weather in Houston has turned colder
column2: we have definitely noticed more requests for hot tea and hot water
column3: so I understand how important it must have been for you to receive it with your meal. Besides that incident
column4: were there any other failures in service to mention? Did the server fail you in any other way(s)? I ask because this type of feedback is essential to helping us improve our station. I also agree that his inattention is unacceptable
column5: and I will speak to him about it immediately. If you are willing and able
column6: please private message me with more information about him so that I can carry out that task.
